meanings.definition: A drug used to treat breast cancer in women
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed tamoxifens to help with her breast cancer.
meanings.sent2: Many women with breast cancer benefit from taking tamoxifens.
meanings.sent3: The bottle of tamoxifens danced on the shelf, eager to fight cancer.
meanings.sent4: Her recovery was a journey through a forest of tamoxifens, each pill a warrior against illness.
meanings.sent5: The pink ribbon symbolized hope and the power of tamoxifens in the fight against cancer.
